{"blocks":[{"key":"2hmva","text":"Spin the supernatant at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a2apd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"800","duration":600,"guid":"A12C8E6067B711EB903007AFCE4A6BE6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jcpt","text":"While tubes are in the centrifuge, prepare in hood the requirements for the next step. Also, rinse the now empty culture flasks with Virkon and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0n8m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4jm1a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2osoq","text":"- Beckman centrifuge tubes [Label!]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"34s4d","text":"- Spare tube if required to balance","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2h7o5","text":"- 45 μm filters","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1qc8t","text":"- 50 ml syringes","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7n7ut","text":"- Centrifuge canisters","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7levc","text":"- Beaker of Virkon","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdvhq","text":"Remove the 50 ml tubes from centrifuge, and in the hood, pour the supernatant into open syringe with attached filter over the labelled Beckman UC tube. After each virus/50 ml tube, change the syringe and filter. Ensuring that the discarded syringe and filter are placed and rinsed in Virkon.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8jr38","text":"Put Beckman UC tubes into their chambers using forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27qnv","text":"To avoid collapsing the tubes, fill up sample tubes with media. Fill up counterweight tubes with DPBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fsvt0","text":"Balance the weight of the tubes carefully, down to 5 ug difference.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlcp8","text":"Clean everything in the hood thoroughly. Any plastics that have been used must be rinsed with Virkon before discarding. Spray pipettes, racks, pipette gun etc. with ethanol. Clean hood surfaces with Virkon first, then with ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4uvf0","text":"Turn off the hood fully and then put the UV on.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9o1kb","text":"Put down rotor, spin it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ibqs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3speb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"68ec9","text":"You don´t have to screw.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k3h6","text":"Put down all 6 chambers into centrifuge [you do not have to weigh the empty ones].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cln9f","text":"Check settings of centrifuge:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5pkj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v0li","text":"-   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2onbr","text":"- Enter to save","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2f6p1","text":"- Ensure Acceleration is set to max","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19b8t","text":"- Ensure Deceleration is set to max","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7na1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"19500","duration":7200,"guid":"676DEC8067B911EB903007AFCE4A6BE6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fl9n5","text":"Wait until centrifuge reaches full speed before leaving.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"liuu","text":"Set alarm for when centrifugation is done, don´t let the tubes stand longer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vvqa","text":"Deceleration of centrifuge takes approx.  . After it reaches 3000G, you can release the vacuum to increase the speed of deceleration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ravj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"C6F4932067B911EB903007AFCE4A6BE6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mmlc","text":"Take out Beckman UC tubes using forceps, and pour out liquid into Virkon.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bibca","text":"Place tuned upside down on paper to dry, be careful to remove all liquid, also from edges and walls.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"on3j","text":"Take a bottle of cold PBS from freezer and resuspend pellet in   [75 ul - 100 ul is ok]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"1534761070A011EBB87245321A24A18F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnc8c","text":"Seal tubes with Parafilm, vortex and put into fridge, leave them there for at least   - but preferably  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9a22a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"67449D2067BA11EB903007AFCE4A6BE6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"2454881070A011EBB87245321A24A18F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k8fo","text":"Aliquot virus [10 ul/tube] and store  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eauhs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"80EFCFB067BA11EB903007AFCE4A6BE6","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2p6fl","text":"Viruses can now be titrated and/or used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
